buff.description_key: You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
While sleeping on a sleeping bag you will cut Infection rate in half.
While sleeping on a small bed you will stop infection rate completely.
While sleeping on a big bed you will counter the infection by half its rate.
Close inspection reveals a minor infection.
Increases wellness slowly over time.
You are well rested.
You are tired and should get some rest
You are feeling pretty tired and should go to sleep.
You are very tired and need to sleep!
You are extremely tired and need to sleep!
You are insanely tired and running on fumes!
You are dead tired, and if you dont sleep soon you will die!
You are clean.
You are dirty and starting to smell, the dirtier you are the more prone you are to infection!
Youre really starting to smell. Might want to take a bath soon.
You are filthy and are highly prone to infection.
buff.tooltip_key: Youre filthy and you really stink

buff.description_key: Any wounds you have are extremely likely to give you an infection. You need to get clean!
buff.tooltip_key: Extremely dirty and prone to infection!

buff.description_key: Rinsing off will not get you completly clean.
Rinsing off will not get you completly clean.
You are bathing and will become clean over time.
